trans-unit.source: Provides methods for enabling and disabling events from event sources.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法來啟用及停用來自事件來源的事件。

trans-unit.source: An event listener represents the target for all events generated by event source (<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource> object) implementations in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 事件接聽程式表示產生的事件來源的所有事件的目標 (<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource>物件) 目前的應用程式定義域中的實作。

trans-unit.source: When a new event listener is created, it is logically attached to all event sources in that application domain.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的事件接聽程式時，就是以邏輯方式附加至應用程式定義域中的所有事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類型會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you must dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您必須處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: An event listener can enable or disable on a per-current event source basis by using event levels (<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventLevel>) and event keywords (<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords>) to further restrict the set of events to be sent to the listener.
trans-unit.target: 事件接聽程式可以啟用或停用每個目前事件來源為基礎，使用事件層級 (<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventLevel>) 和事件的關鍵字 (<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords>) 來進一步限制要傳送至接聽程式的事件集。

trans-unit.source: The listener can also send arbitrary commands to a specific current event source by using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.SendCommand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 接聽程式也可以傳送任意命令給特定的目前事件來源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.SendCommand%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The meanings of the commands are specific to the implementation of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 命令的意義特有的事件來源實作。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Guid%2A> property in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource> object that is used to enable or disable events is <xref:System.Guid.Empty>, all event sources in the application domain are affected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Guid%2A>屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource>用來啟用或停用事件的物件是<xref:System.Guid.Empty>，應用程式定義域中的所有事件來源會受到都影響。

trans-unit.source: Multiple event listeners can be defined in a single application domain.
trans-unit.target: 可以在單一應用程式定義域中定義多個事件接聽程式。

trans-unit.source: Each listener is logically independent of the other listeners so that events that are enabled or disabled by one listener affect only that listener.
trans-unit.target: 啟用或停用一個接聽程式之事件的影響該接聽程式，每個接聽程式是邏輯上獨立於其他接聽程式。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for commands sent with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.SendCommand%2A> method to do a semantic operation (such as a garbage collection or flushing data) that affects the other listeners, but this is the exception rather than the rule.
trans-unit.target: 傳送與命令可能會<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.SendCommand%2A>方法，以進行語意的作業 （例如，記憶體回收或排清資料） 會影響其他接聽程式，但這是例外狀況，而不是此規則。

trans-unit.source: Each event source keeps a list of event listeners that it sends events to.
trans-unit.target: 每個事件來源會保留它傳送至事件的事件接聽程式的清單。

trans-unit.source: A set of filtering criteria is associated with each event source-listener pair.
trans-unit.target: 一組篩選準則是每個事件接聽程式的來源組相關聯。

trans-unit.source: These criteria determine the events that listener will receive for the current event source.
trans-unit.target: 這些準則決定事件的接聽程式將會收到目前事件來源。

trans-unit.source: Listeners receive the events on their <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventWritten%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 接聽程式上收到的事件其<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventWritten%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, subclasses of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener> must override this method to do something useful with the data.
trans-unit.target: 因此，子類別的<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener>必須覆寫這個方法，以執行某些有用的資料。

trans-unit.source: When a new event source is created, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventSourceCreated%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的事件來源時，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventSourceCreated%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Every current event listener gets exactly one <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventSourceCreated%2A> call for every current event source that can send it log messages.
trans-unit.target: 每個目前的事件接聽程式取得一個<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventSourceCreated%2A>呼叫每個目前的事件來源可以將它傳送的記錄訊息。

trans-unit.source: When an event listener is created, a series of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventSourceCreated%2A> calls are made to notify the new listener of all the event sources that existed before the listener was created.
trans-unit.target: 事件接聽程式建立的時，一系列的<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventSourceCreated%2A>會呼叫以通知之前所建立的接聽程式的所有事件來源的新的接聽程式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: All events are disabled when a new instance is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體時，會停用所有事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.EnableEvents%2A> methods to enable events.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.EnableEvents%2A>方法來啟用事件。

trans-unit.source: The event source to disable events for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其停用事件的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: Disables all events for the specified event source.
trans-unit.target: 停用指定之事件來源的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Guid%2A> property for `eventSource` is <xref:System.Guid.Empty>, events for all event sources in the application domain are disabled for this event listener.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Guid%2A>屬性`eventSource`是<xref:System.Guid.Empty>，已停用此事件接聽程式的應用程式定義域中的所有事件來源的事件。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener" /> 類別的目前執行個體所使用的資源釋出。

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener>.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener>。

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 方法會將 <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Enables events for the specified event source.
trans-unit.target: 啟用指定之事件來源的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event source to enable events for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其啟用事件的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The level of events to enable.
trans-unit.target: 要啟用的事件的層級。

trans-unit.source: Enables events for the specified event source that has the specified verbosity level or lower.
trans-unit.target: 啟用具有指定詳細資訊層級或更低之指定事件來源的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Guid%2A> property in the specified `eventSource` is <xref:System.Guid.Empty>, all event sources in the application domain are affected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Guid%2A>屬性中指定`eventSource`是<xref:System.Guid.Empty>，應用程式定義域中的所有事件來源會受到都影響。

trans-unit.source: The event source to enable events for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其啟用事件的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The level of events to enable.
trans-unit.target: 要啟用的事件的層級。

trans-unit.source: The keyword flags necessary to enable the events.
trans-unit.target: 啟用事件所需的關鍵字旗標。

trans-unit.source: Enables events for the specified event source that has the specified verbosity level or lower, and matching keyword flags.
trans-unit.target: 啟用具有指定詳細資訊層級或更低且符合關鍵字旗標之指定事件來源的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Guid%2A> property in the specified `eventSource` is <xref:System.Guid.Empty>, all event sources in the application domain are affected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Guid%2A>屬性中指定`eventSource`是<xref:System.Guid.Empty>，應用程式定義域中的所有事件來源會受到都影響。

trans-unit.source: The event source to enable events for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其啟用事件的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The level of events to enable.
trans-unit.target: 要啟用的事件的層級。

trans-unit.source: The keyword flags necessary to enable the events.
trans-unit.target: 啟用事件所需的關鍵字旗標。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to be matched to enable the events.
trans-unit.target: 要啟用事件所比對的引數。

trans-unit.source: Enables events for the specified event source that has the specified verbosity level or lower, matching event keyword flag, and matching arguments.
trans-unit.target: 啟用具有指定詳細資訊層級或更低且符合關鍵字旗標及引數之指定事件來源的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Guid%2A> property in the specified `eventSource` is <xref:System.Guid.Empty>, all event sources in the application domain are affected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Guid%2A>屬性中指定`eventSource`是<xref:System.Guid.Empty>，應用程式定義域中的所有事件來源會受到都影響。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an event source (<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource" /> object) is attached to the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 發生於將事件來源 (<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource" /> 物件) 附加至發送器時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.EventSourceCreated> occurs for all existing event sources when the event listener is created, as well as for any event sources that are created after the event listener's creation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.EventSourceCreated> ，就會發生的所有現有的事件來源的事件接聽程式建立時，也與事件接聽程式建立之後，會建立任何事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The event source to find the index for.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找其索引的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a small non-negative number that represents the specified event source.
trans-unit.target: 取得小的非負數，其代表指定的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: A small non-negative number that represents the specified event source.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定之事件來源的小的非負數。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.EventSourceIndex%2A> identifies an event source that is suitable for indexing an array.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.EventSourceIndex%2A>識別事件來源，可適用於陣列編製索引。

trans-unit.source: This integer is unique within the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 此整數是應用程式定義域中唯一的。

trans-unit.source: An event listener might find it useful to store additional information about each event source that is connected to it.
trans-unit.target: 事件接聽程式可能會很有用來儲存每個連線至轉送的事件來源的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.EventSourceIndex%2A> allows this extra information to be efficiently stored in a expandable array such as `List<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.EventSourceIndex%2A>可讓此額外的資訊，有效率地儲存在可展開的陣列例如`List<T>`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an event has been written by an event source (<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource" /> object) for which the event listener has enabled events.
trans-unit.target: 發生於事件已由事件接聽程式已啟用事件的事件來源 (<see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource" /> 物件) 寫入時。

trans-unit.source: The event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: Called for all existing event sources when the event listener is created and when a new event source is attached to the listener.
trans-unit.target: 當事件接聽程式已建立且新事件來源已附加至接聽程式時，針對所有現有的事件來源來呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Event source implementations should be aware that these callbacks are issued for existing event sources when the event listener is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源實作應該要知道事件接聽程式具現化時，會為現有的事件來源發出這些回呼。

trans-unit.source: In a multithreaded environment, it is possible for <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventWritten%2A> callbacks to occur before the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventSourceCreated%2A> callback.
trans-unit.target: 在多執行緒環境中，可能會<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventWritten%2A>回呼之前發生<xref:System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener.OnEventSourceCreated%2A>回呼。

trans-unit.source: The event arguments that describe the event.
trans-unit.target: 描述這個事件的事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Called whenever an event has been written by an event source for which the event listener has enabled events.
trans-unit.target: 每當事件由事件接聽程式已啟用事件的事件來源寫入時呼叫。
